DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether exergame use improve user health , term physical fitness , self-rated mental health physical health , favorable attitude , strong intention , actual behavior future exercise . Moreover , study also examine whether past exercise moderate impact exergame use user health .
DOC.detailed_description: The main hypothesis : H1 : Compared control group participant ( use exergame ) experimental group participant ( use exergame ) good change physical fitness . The difference two group amount change negatively related past exercise . H2 : Compared control group participant ( use exergame ) experimental group participant ( use exergame ) good change ( ) mental health ( b ) physical health intervention . The difference two group amount change negatively related past exercise . H3 : Compared control group participant ( use exergame ) experimental group participant ( use exergame ) good change ( ) attitude , ( b ) intention ( c ) behavior another exercise future . The difference two group amount change negatively related past exercise .
